item.title: LoRaWAN Evaluation
item.description: Contents Introduction Motivation Aim Structure Related Work Hardware Microcontroller Gateways Printed Circuit Board Software TheThingsNetwork Platformio Sensor Node InfluxDB Database Grafana Dashboard Resources CayenneLPP Sensors Conclusion Outlook Code Utility Sensor Node References Introduction This project evaluates the LoRa frequency modulation and the LoRaWAN stack as an alternative for existing sensor setups using the technologies ZigBee and GSM.
